API Reference

Overview:
Onename API is organized around REST. Our API is designed to have predictable, resource-oriented URLs and to use HTTP response codes to indicate API errors. JSON will be returned in all responses from the API, including errors.


Onename Profile API:

The Profile API returns the public Onename profile. Return Profile Based on onename ID or onename URL:

onename_id: If you know the onename iD of the profile you want to display, you can use it as the key value for this API call. You should include id= to indicate that you are using a member token. Requesting by member token only returns a profile from the logged in person's three degree network and doesn't return any out-of-network profiles. You cannot use a member token to get a public profile.
GET: http://api.onename.com/v1/people/id=muneeb

Fields Returned:

Field Parent Node Details
Name People
avatar People
Location People
Bio People
Cover People
Github People
Instagram People
Facebook People
twitter People
linkedin People

People Search API:

Overview: The People Search API returns information about people. It lets you implement most of what shows up when you do a search for "People" in the top right box on onename.io *to be implemented* Use the People Search API to find people using keywords, name, Location,twitter handle, BTC public address or other criteria. It returns a list of matching member profiles. Each entry can contain much of the information available on the person's member profile page. *parameters to be confirmed*

Authentication

Send a request http://localhost:5003/v1/gen_developer_key/?developer_id=asjad

Adding specific parameters

Refine your search by providing query parameters, such as keywords, first-name, last-name, and twitter,BTC Address:

GET:
using keywords e.g full-name:

http://api.onename.com/v1/people-search/?access_token=a0fe2f40415f7451c4ba2eae7da963d5&keywords=muneeb

using btc_address:

http://api.onename.com/v1/people-search/?access_token=a0fe2f40415f7451c4ba2eae7da963d5&keywords=1G6pazv8zjWKBWouXVgHHvgmRmSm7JmH3S

using twitter handle:

http://api.onename.com/v1/people-search/?access_token=a0fe2f40415f7451c4ba2eae7da963d5&keywords=ryaneshea


Public Profile URL: Using the Public Profile URL will return a profile from inside or outside the logged in member's three degree network. The Public Profile URL must be URL escaped.
GET: http://api.onename.com/v1/people/url= Details:

Usage:

You must use an access token to make an authenticated call on behalf of a user.

Input Values:

    Unless otherwise specified:
  • All input is case insensitive.
  • Multiple words should be joined using a space. Since you need to URL encode input, this translates to %20. For example, Andrew%20Clark.
  • When you pass in multiple words, we search for all words in the string without regard to the order in which they are passed in. In keywords this means the words can appear in any of the fields searched.
  • Wildcards and boolean logic isn't supported (e.g. *, ?, AND, and OR)
